## R-packages

To proceed, install/load the following packages:

```{r}
#| eval: false
# install packages --------------------------------
install.packages("Wcompo")
install.packages("WR")
install.packages("rmt")
install.packages("WA")
# load packages -----------------------------------
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(Wcompo)
library(WR)
library(rmt)
library(WA)
```
